title: Waltz across Texas with a Shoe and a Fart
description: Two bungling, nerdy college kids on spring break come up with a half-baked idea to travel from East Texas to West Texas in their new "sporty and cool" smart car recording – and uploading to YouTube and Facebook-- their adventures on their spiffy smart phone. Their journey is a calamity of errors as many things go wrong and only a few go right. They meet many fun and interesting characters and some who do not have the best of intentions catapulting Audie and Barnard into dangerous, high-chase games while fighting for their lives. You won’t want to miss this fun, riveting novel chock-full of down-home amenities for all to enjoy.
author: Mark    Mills
